articles.author: dvinik@politico.com (Danny Vinik)
articles.title: 138 things Trump did this year while you weren't looking
articles.description: Behind the crazy headlines, more conservative priorities got pushed through than most people realize. An exhaustive list of what really happened to the government in 2017.
